articles.title: Stocks slip, havens rally as new COVID-19 variant spooks investors - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks suffered their sharpest drop in two months on Friday after the detection of a new and possibly vaccine-resistant coronavirus variant sent investors scurrying toward the safety of bonds, the yen and the dollar.

articles.title: Defence Minister Peter Dutton says China considers Australia a 'tributary state' that should submit to its power - ABC News
articles.description: The Defence Minister says China sees Australia and other countries in the region as subordinate states that should be submissive to it, as he warns Beijing would quickly dominate Asia if it succeeds in invading Taiwan.

articles.title: Asia stocks tumble, havens rally on worry over new Covid-19 variant; STI down 1% - The Straits Times
articles.description: The detection of the B.1.1529 strain comes on top of concerns in markets about high inflation and faster exit from ultra-loose monetary settings. . Read more at straitstimes.com.
